Key_Components: Inventory Service | Payment Gateway | Cart | Order State Machine
Anti_Patterns: Distributed transactions without Saga | Direct DB calls between modules | No inventory locking

Key_Components: Multi-tenant Isolation | RBAC Engine | Subscription Lifecycle
Anti_Patterns: Tenant data leakage | No audit trail | Shared tables without isolation

Key_Components: Double-entry Ledger | Idempotency Keys | Fraud Detection | KYC
Anti_Patterns: Mutable transaction logs | No idempotency | Single-entry bookkeeping | Weak auth

Key_Components: Feed Generation | Graph Relationships | Media Processing | Notifications
Anti_Patterns: Synchronous feed generation | N+1 queries on relationships | No CDN for media
